summary: MODEL # 41422.  ONCE CHILD WAS PLACED AND SECURED IN THE CHILD SAFETY SEAT, CONSUMER STATED THE HANDLE WAS LIFTED AND LOCKED IN PLACE FOR CARRYING.  CONSUMER LIFTED THE HANDLE, AND THE HANDLE RELEASED UNEXPECTANTLY, SEAT FLIPPED FOWARD AND THE CHILD FELL OUT.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.*JB
